mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reference to the character Rarity, of the animated series My Little Pony. Unattributed lyrics from "Styrofoam Boots / Itâ€™s All Nice on Ice, Alright" by Modest Mouse. Encouraging phrase. Comment about being in the stacks, with response. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Rarity is best pony | Well all's not well | But I'm told it'll all be quite nice | I am proud of you. | get out of the stacks you boring whore. aren't you here too?
